pullrequest.title: [Blueprint] Add support for moving and rotating models

content.raw:
At the moment, this function is returning the "top level" parent, which may not be a model. On Gazebo classic, that's what the [Visual::GetRootVisual](http://gazebosim.org/api/dev/classgazebo_1_1rendering_1_1Visual.html#a3482cd60680141d17631c8deeda2e14d) method returned. I realize that that naming may be confused with `Scene::RootVisual` though. Maybe there's another way we can call it?

This image from [this osrf/gazebo PR](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/1613/) helps a bit:

![](https://bitbucket-assetroot.s3.amazonaws.com/repository/jgXqbo/1543323319-ancestors.png?Signature=eY6JpIz4w0tUQMFF2CJMSOz04z0%3D&Expires=1557767820&AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAIQWXW6WLXMB5QZAQ)
